summary: Scotland Yard sends a goofy pair to check on foul play at a mansion outside 1920s London.
cast: Tim Conway|Don Knotts|Trisha Noble|Bernard Fox|Grace Zabriskie|John Fujioka|Stan Ross|Irwin Keyes|Suzy Mandel|Fred Stuthman|Mary Nell Santacroce|Robert V. Barron|Patrick Cranshaw|Russi Taylor|Barney Rosner
title: Detectives casi privados
